properties.record:
SELECT 
     servedmsisdn AS DOC_ID, globalid AS ENTRY_ID, subscriberid AS OBJECT_ID,globalid AS PARENT_ID,
     NULL AS BAN, NULL AS CARRIER_ID,accountactivateddate AS CREATION_DATE, 
     CASE accountactivatedflag
        WHEN 'true' THEN 'Active'
        WHEN 'false' THEN 'Inactive'
        ELSE 'Unknown'
     END AS CURRENT_STATE,
     NULL AS CYCLE_DAY,
     servicefeeexpirydate AS EXPIRY_DATE,
     datasetname AS FIRST_NAME,
     NULL AS IMEI,
     NULL AS IMSI,
     datasetname AS LAST_NAME,
     'prepaid-lifecycle' AS LIFECYCLE_ID,
     NULL AS LOCALE,
     servedmsisdn AS MSISDN,
     datasetname AS  OWNER,
     NULL AS  PREFERRED_NOTIFICATION_CHANNEL,
     NULL AS  PREVIOUS_CYCLE_DAY,
     'IDLE' AS  PREVIOUS_STATE,
     NULL AS  PRIVILEGE_PROFILE,
     subscriberid AS SUBSCRIBER_ID,
     NULL AS TITLE,
     snapshottime AS TRANSITION_DATE,
     'prepaid' AS TYPE,
     NULL AS ONE_TIME_REDIRECTION_FLAG,
     NULL AS TRACE,
     sourcefile AS FileName,
     RecordType,
     DateParsed,
     Operator
FROM FLOWFILE
